attributes.title: Love Is The Pure Strategy To Receive Ultimate Power And Manifest As Ultimate Force
attributes.description:
27 NOVEMBER 2019 - POWERFUL COGNITIONS OF NITHYANANDA (ENGLISH) SATSANG 

*I WANT TO THANK ALL THE PEOPLE SHOWERING THEIR SUPPORT, LOVE, GRATITUDE, FEELING CONNECTION ON ME AND THE SANGA FROM ALL OVER THE WORLD - UNEXPECTED AND UNKNOWN CORNERS OF THE WORLD, PEOPLE WHOM I HAVE NEVER MET PERSONALLY. 

*SRI MOHANKUMAR JI ADVOCATE FROM KERALA, I THANK YOU PERSONALLY FOR THE SUPPORT. PAYAL ROHATGI, I WANT TO THANK YOU FOR STICKING YOUR NECK OUT STANDING UP FOR ME KNOWING THE TROLLS. HATS OFF FOR STANDING OUT FOR THE TRUTH. I HAVE A LONG LIST OF PEOPLE WHO ARE UPLOADING THEIR VIDEOS IN SUPPORT. IF YOU SEND THE LINK TO REGISTRAR@KAILAASA.ORG  WE WILL PRESENT IT TO THE WORLD THROUGH OUR SOCIAL MEDIA PLATFORMS ALSO. 

*NOT JUST VIEWERSHIP BUT SUBSCRIBERS ALSO HAVE INCREASED 300% MORE. ALL OF YOU SHOULD KNOW, PEOPLE, CLICKING OUT OF CURIOSITY IS DIFFERENT, SUBSCRIBING IS DIFFERENT. 

*TODAY’S REVELATIONS FROM KAILAASA, PARAMASHIVA JNANA - KNOWLEDGE -  AND PARAMASHIVA VIJNANA - MAKING KNOWLEDGE INTO PRACTICAL EXPERIENCE/REALITY. 

*PAST FEW DAYS I WAS EXPLAINING ABOUT PURE POWER, PARAMASHIVA AND PURE POWER EMBODYING AND MANIFESTING AS ESHWARA SHAKTI, FORCE. 

*ONE LINE I RECEIVED FROM ANNAMALAI SWAMIGAL. HE IS ONE OF THE GREATEST GURUS WHO INSPIRED AND INFLUENCED MY LIFE. I HAD VARIOUS LEVELS OF SUPPORT LIKE ACHARYAS WHO GAVE KNOWLEDGE, AND GURUS WHO GAVE EXPERIENCE, AND ULTIMATE GURU WHERE PARAMASHIVA HIMSELF CAME AS ARUNAGIRI YOGISHWARA. IN GURUS, I WILL SURELY PLACE ANNAMALAI SWAMIGAL BECAUSE OF THE IMPORTANT ROLE HE PLAYED IN MY LIFE. ONCE HE TOLD ME, “ONLY BY LOVE, LIFE FORCE WILL START RADIATING OR MANIFESTING IN THE BODY.”

*WHAT I AM GOING TO EXPLAIN NOW IS THE CHEMISTRY OF ESHWARA SHAKTI, PURE POWER, PARAMASHIVA EMBODYING AND MANIFESTING AS ESHWARA SHAKTI, PURE FORCE. ULTIMATE POWER MANIFESTING AS ULTIMATE FORCE. 

*ANNAMALAI SWAMIGAL AND ME HAVE A SWEET INTIMATE RELATIONSHIP. WHOEVER CALLS ME IN SINGULAR, TREATS ME LIKE THEIR SON OR GRANDSON, THAT IS WHAT I CALL SWEET, INTIMATE RELATIONSHIP. ANNAMALAI SWAMIGAL WAS IN THE COMMUNITY I WAS ALSO BORN AND BROUGHT UP. IN TAMIL NADU, EACH COMMUNITY HAS THEIR OWN SLANG. IN MY COMMUNITY SLANG HE USED TO ADDRESS ME AS “DEI”. THAT IS HOW A SON, GRANDSON OR KIDS ARE ADDRESSED. 

*LET ME EXPLAIN THIS CHEMISTRY OF PURE POWER MANIFESTING AS PURE FORCE. IF  YOU UNDERSTAND THIS CHEMISTRY, YOU CAN SOLVE EVERYTHING IN YOUR LIFE PRACTICALLY. 

*SOME PEOPLE ARE COMMENTING, ON SOCIAL MEDIA WHICH WAS BROUGHT TO MY NOTICE TO ANSWER. SOMEONE ASKED, ‘WHY ARE YOU NOT SOLVING YOUR PROBLEMS?’ UNDERSTAND, I AM SOLVING! AFTER SO MANY ATTACKS ON ME, IN MULTILEVEL - ASSASSINATION, LAW FARE, HATESPEECH, ETC, NOT ONLY I MASTERED THIS WHOLE SCIENCE, I HAVE ALSO GAINED DEEP INSIGHTS ON HUMAN MIND AND COLLECTIVE MIND AND HOW THE OPINIONS ARE MOULDED. HOW OPINION CREATORS REACT AND ACT, HOW A HINDU ORGANIZATION AND HINDU GURUS ARE ATTACKED, WHY THEY ARE ATTACKED, WHO ALL WITHSTOOD AND SURVIVED THE ATTACKS, WHO ALL COLLAPSED AND GOT DESTROYED. 

*LAST 20 YEARS, I HAVE ALMOST MASTERED IT. FIRST AND FOREMOST REASON IS PARAMASHIVA, PARASHAKTI AND KALABHAIRAVA PROTECTING ME CONTINUOUSLY WITH THEIR GRACE AND BLESSINGS. THAT IS WHY CONTINUOUSLY I AM ONLY SOLVING THE PROBLEMS. 

*THE RECORDED FIRST PUBLIC ATTACK WITH EVIDENCE AVAILABLE IS 2003. I WAS GUIDED PERSONALLY BY TIRUCHI SWAMIGAL IN 2003, MY GODFATHER. VERY COMFORTABLY WITH A LOT OF RESPECT, I WILL PLACE HIM AS ONE OF MY GURUS AND GODFATHER. NOT ONLY HE WILL ADDRESS ME IN SINGULAR - “DEI”, HE HAS 5 - 6 WORDS FOR ME, SUCH AS “MUDALIAR’S GRANDSON” AND “TAMBUDU” - INTIMATE WORD TO CALL YOUNGER BROTHER”. 

*THIS ULTIMATE POWER MANIFESTING AS ULTIMATE FORCE IN US CAN HELP SOLVE ISSUES FROM HEALTH, RELATIONSHIP, MANIFESTING WEALTH, ENLIGHTENMENT, EVERYTHING. ENLIGHTENMENT IS YOUR RELATIONSHIP WITH PARAMASHIVA. THE TRUST LEVEL BETWEEN YOU AND YOUR GURU, WHEN THAT REACHES THE ULTIMATE, YOU CAN RELAX AND FALL INTO HIS SPACE, IN A COMFORTABLE WAY, THAT’S ALL! NOTHING ELSE IS REQUIRED! YOU ARE ENLIGHTENED! YOU ARE LIVING ENLIGHTENMENT!
